title: There's No Such Thing As Orange

media:group.media:title: There's No Such Thing As Orange
media:group.media:description:
“We have been to the moon, we have charted the depths of the ocean and the heart of the atom, but we have a fear of looking inward to ourselves because we sense that is where all the contradictions flow together.” – Terence McKenna

This one was inspired after a chat I had with the magnificent mystiverse. He makes wonderful stuff  ► https://www.youtube.com/c/mystiverse
To hear all this stuff explained better than me (though admittedly with less cats) ► https://youtu.be/uhRhtFFhNzQ
It was also heavily influenced by Chrstof Koch’s brilliant ‘Consciousness: Confessions of a Romantic Reductionist’ (which I suggest you give a read if you’d like to) ► https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/13557108-consciousness

Discord server ► https://discord.gg/76ybBSR 
T-shirts, mugs, and sadness ► https://teespring.com/stores/exurb1a (just in case that doesn’t work: discord.gg/exurb1a)
The Fifth Science Paperback ► https://tinyurl.com/y5zj33s5 (you may need to change your region accordingly: .co.uk, etc) 
The rest of my books ► https://tinyurl.com/ycnl5bo3
I also make horrendous music ► https://soundcloud.com/exurbia-1
 For sending personalised insults ► https://www.facebook.com/exurb1a/ 
Help me to do this full-time if you're deranged enough ► https://www.patreon.com/exurb1r?ty=h 

The music was provided by the bad boy of musical impressionism himself, Ravel ►  https://youtu.be/r30D3SW4OVw

Also, Skinner/Skinner, Seagulls Circling ► https://youtu.be/qNvIbuXQ1Ng
